name: diversifying
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
diversify
[ I ] to start to include more different types or things: Millions of years ago, changes in the earth's climate caused animal and plant life to diversify.
[ I or T ] If a business diversifies, it starts making new products or offering new services: Many wheat farmers have begun to diversify into other forms of agriculture.
